if.if: where user_id in (select user_id from user where nickname like concat('%', #{word},'%'))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO itinerary_detail (user_id, register_date, start_date, end_date, title, content) VALUES ( #{userId}, NOW(), #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{content});
INSERT INTO itinerary_place (place_name, place_address, place_order, place_comment, itinerary_id) VALUES (#{placeName}, #{placeAddress}, #{placeOrder}, #{placeComment}, #{itineraryId})
mapper.select: SELECT d.itinerary_id, d.user_id, d.register_date, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.title, d.content, p.place_name, p.place_address, p.place_order, p.place_comment, p.place_id, u.nickname FROM itinerary_detail d LEFT JOIN itinerary_place p ON d.itinerary_id = p.itinerary_id LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE d.itinerary_id = #{itineraryId} order by p.place_order
